title: The Intelligence - “For Netanyahu, it’s important to get to election day as ‘the great vaccinator’”—immunity in Israel
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: how big oil is approaching its big problems and the pandemic reshapes China’s clubbing scene“For Netanyahu, it’s important to get to election day as ‘the great vaccinator’”—immunity in IsraelAGGRESSIVE PURCHASING, solid logistics and a competitive health-care system have led to a world-beating rate of immunisation—but, as ever, politics is playing a role, too.
Big oil had a terrible 2020, but the sector’s troubles pre-date the pandemic; we look at the supermajors’ varying approaches to an uncertain future.
And how covid-19 is reshaping China’s clubbing scene.
Runtime: 23minListen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneInFor full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
paragraphs: Also on the daily podcast: how big oil is approaching its big problems and the pandemic reshapes China’s clubbing scene
“For Netanyahu, it’s important to get to election day as ‘the great vaccinator’”—immunity in Israel

AGGRESSIVE PURCHASING, solid logistics and a competitive health-care system have led to a world-beating rate of immunisation—but, as ever, politics is playing a role, too. Big oil had a terrible 2020, but the sector’s troubles pre-date the pandemic; we look at the supermajors’ varying approaches to an uncertain future. And how covid-19 is reshaping China’s clubbing scene. Runtime: 23min
Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn
